reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas warm for cold days, soft, and comfortable, with one customer noting they feel like wearing a blanket. They receive positive feedback for their quality and appearance, though some mention they run small. The fit and seam quality receive mixed reviews - while some find them snug around the neck, others say they're too tight, and several report issues with seams coming apart.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent but Beware
items.body: I bought this set of pajamas on impulse. I live in a cold draft house and thought they looked incredibly warm and comfy. Perfect for a snowy day indoors. The package arrived and was somewhat heavy. Inside was the most fluffiest pajamas I ever saw. The fit was perfect, but I looked like a Panda. They are super warm to the point I started to sweat. The BEWARE is because my dog thought it looked like one of her soft, fluffy toys. When I'm wear them she nibbles on the arms or legs. She constantly nuzzles me on the couch. I fold them and leave them on my bed in the morning before I shower. I come back and find her curled up in them. It's the funniest thing. So both humans & animals love these pajamas, they are as described, fluffy, warm & comfy. Read more
items.author: Boxermom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical and Warm Set
items.body: I stuck with my size medium and was fine with the size. I am 5"6' and 145 pounds. The fit was just right for me. I read the comments of those who gave 1 star. If you don't like bulky, it's not for you. I am anemic and can almost never get warm enough. This pajama set did not disappoint in that area. The pants have deep pockets that I can put my phone in when lounging around the house. I have no idea what this fabric is. However, it is definitely soft and comfortable. Several buyers noted rips and tears after a few wears/washes. My rating is based on my experience within two weeks of purchasing. I hope I will still feel the same next year this time. That's the only thing about reviews. All hell will sometimes break loose after you post a good review. Overall, if you are looking to be warm and don't mind a little bulk, you will love this set. I purchased three. If you are looking for a sexy fit, this is not for you. It's just a good practical pajama that serves the need I was hoping it would serve. Read more
items.author: Towngirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTE PERFECTION!!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Edit: Very disappointed. I ordered a 2nd and a 3rd pair because I originally gave a raving 5 star review (which follows below this edit) but my 2nd pair in green has a hole in the top in two places. Havenâ€™t even WORN them yet and did a cold cycle, gentle option washing first (didnâ€™t wash the 1st pair yet) and found the holes while folding. This is a big disappointment for me because I thought I found the perfect pajamas. They still ARE but if this is a sign of how they will last, and for $33? Man itâ€™s impossible to find quality items anymore it seems. Reducing to 2 stars because having holes in warm pajamas kinda takes all the fun out of it :( Edit #2: I have felt so bad about not keeping my 5-star review for 2 days because these pajamas have changed my mental health and how I FEEL in my home! I wish things were made to last, and holes after 1 wash and no wear is completely unacceptable. But because my first pair has no holes (yet) and I CANNOT WAIT to put these on every night, Iâ€™m sacrificing my ethics and making it 4 stars because they make me THAT happy. OMG 10 out of 5 STARS! I have been hunting for the perfect pair of pajamas with very strict criteria for 3 years now! THESE ARE THOSE! Where do I begin? Soft? Uh, the kind where you make everyone touch them and you yourself canâ€™t stop touching? CHECK! Absolutely no air chill coming through the material in my drafty house from the 50s? YES! And I didnâ€™t believe they would be because NOTHING has stood up to this house in the 3 years Iâ€™ve been here (hence the â€œGreat Pajama Huntâ€. Elastic ankles to stop allowing drafts UP MY LEGS? YES! Pockets? YES! As for sizing, Iâ€™d say stick to your regular size. I am a small, these are a small. If these hold up in the wash, I will buy 10 more pairs! If they lose a little softness in the wash? Iâ€™ll STILL order 10 more pairs! This is absolutely an AMAZING product! So happy!!! The top can be worn out because itâ€™s so cute! In fact, so can these bottoms! Iâ€™m OBSESSED. Read more
items.author: Friend to Homeless

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy & pretty
items.body: Nice and soft, warm on cold winters day. I can turn down my thermostat to 66 and still be warm in this cotton & polyester day wear. Pretty enough to wear around family visits too. Read more
items.author: kh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy
items.body: These are SOFT and WARM!!! They do run a bit small, I suggest going up a size. I like them so much I bought a pair for my sil for Christmas! Read more
items.author: A. M. C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, warm, adorable Ewok.
items.body: I am wearing these pajamas as I text. ðŸ˜Š. I resemble an adorable Ewok. The pajamas are cute and the color (blue) was exactly as advertised. They are well-crafted. They definitely keep you warm while sleeping or just lounging around the house; they are comfortable too. My body temperature had to get accustomed to the thickness and warmth of the pajamas. One can turned down the thermostat at night and sleep warmly in these pajamas. I have gotten too hot at times, but Iâ€™ve adjusted by sleeping on top of my bed covers. They are light weight, yet also thick. I found it bulky when folding and storing in my dresser drawer. Best if washed in cold water. Read more
items.author: R. Davis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: Feel great, warm, only problem is the pants is a little off. They shouldâ€™ve been longer and a little bigger but so comfy walking around the house. Read more
items.author: KK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are good
items.body: My wife love these. I was going to give them to her on Christmas, but she was so cold one day. So I decided she will get an early gift. She loves these pajamas and she told me she gets super warm in them. She loves the material and how they feel. I bought a size M for her. She is 5'5 and she weighs around 127. They are a little big but she likes them like that. T Read more
items.author: Sean Jamal Oscorris

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Purple, Apricot, Dark Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
